message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $150. It's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents good value for this product, I can meet you halfway at $115. That's my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
